text: @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency As expected, it is not 'quicker all round'. I just sat on hold for ages before giving up. Nor is this an 'incident'. The trap is regularly cleaned according to the local authorities. Only it hasn‚Äôt been, and is overflowing into the reservoir. Please fix.

We‚Äôve now issued the 1st of @EnvAgencyNW #flood alerts. Won‚Äôt be last & we will be issuing warnings In the days ahead. Full details at https://t.co/vKsRlvVySm #PrepareActSurvive #floodaware https://t.co/FPrIB2wi5p

Very heavy rain is expected over the next 24 hours so please make sure you are prepared by following the latest updates from @EnvAgencyNW and @metoffice. Information and advice is also available on our website - https://t.co/CIwQ4NipwB #StormChristoph https://t.co/nPBPXSAyMr
